metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0196 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit SDK contains a bug in cuobjdump, where a local user running the tool against an ill-formed binary may cause a null- pointer dereference, which may result in a limited denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
